summary: This adds a guard on Your personal home
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][center]- GUARDS ON YOUR HOME - [/b][/size][/center]

[b][size=3]Description:[/b][/size]
[b][size=2] 
~This adds a Guards on your personal home:
~The size of the file is big because of the facegendata

Update:
 
 4 Guards on every home in :

Heljarchen Hall
Lakeview Manor 
Windstad Manor

Guards only have melee and Range (except wizards etc)
 Even If you dont buy the house , the guards are still there.
 
Guards 100% sure that it\'s respawn and increased healing rate by 89% .
 So they wont easily die.

[/b][/size]

[b][size=3] Bugs [/b][/size]
[b][size=2]
 i dont know . But if you do find one please tell me [/b][/size]

[b][size=3] Incompabilities [/b][/size]
[b][size=2] 
 Dont know, Still looking for it :)
[/b][/size]

[b][size=3] Updates : [/b][/size]
[b][size=2]
 v1 = initial release
 v1.5 :
= Fixed Facegendata
= Reduced Guards 7 now only 4
= Guards do now patrol around in your home <there\'s might bug , if it does tell me :)>
= Guards do now use Torches .
= Fixed Factions
= Fixed Relationships
[/b][/size]

[b][size=3] How to update it to new version : [/b][/size]
[b][size=2] 
~ Download my mod
~ uninstall the old version 
~ load your game then save it on a new game
~ install the new version
~ then load your game 
 Happy Playing :)
[/b][/size]

[b][size=3] Things to do : [/b][/size]
[b][size=2]
~ Add some camps for them
~ More npc
~ Enemies etc,
~ and lots more
[/b][/size]

[b][size=3] REQUIRES HEARTHFIRE AND HIGHER VERSION OF SKYRIM :)[/B][/SIZE]

[b][size=3] 
 Credits to bethesda/creation kit [/b][/size]

[b][size=2] Abram [/b][/size]
author: Abram1

files.name: Guards on Your Home v1-5
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Facegendata
Reduced Guards 7 now only 4
Guards do now patrol around in your home
Guards do now use Torches .
Fixed Factions
Fixed Relationships
